suite.name: Facebook

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

arguments.arg: ยินดีต้อนรับสู่ Facebook - เข้าสู่ระบบ ลงทะเบียน หรือเรียนรู้เพิ่มเติม

kw.msg: Page title is 'ยินดีต้อนรับสู่ Facebook - เข้าสู่ระบบ ลงทะเบียน หรือเรียนรู้เพิ่มเติม'.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` contains text `expected`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=u_0_1v' contains text 'What's on your mind?'.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

arguments.arg: Hello from Robot Framework. This is Tan's fist robot framework script.

kw.msg: Typing text 'Hello from Robot Framework. This is Tan's fist robot framework script.' into text field 'id=u_0_1v'

suite.doc: ทดสอบ ระบบ FaceBook ด้วยการ Login และ Update Status
